name: The Great Maze: An Apocalypse TP story
name_original: The Great Maze: An Apocalypse TP story
description:
A quick mini game built in the Apocalypse TP universe for a school assignment. 

The Plague Doctor, in his endless quest to find the world's rarest commodity- Toilet Paper- has encounters the Great Maze.  With twists and turns hiding the keys to progress through the maze, and with every door potentially hiding a deadly adversary, can the Plague Doctor reach the end of the Great Maze and recover its golden treasure?

*SoundFX to be added soon*

*Character Controller made using Rigidbody and Cinemachine package was not used*
